job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of improving AI models through feedback and participation in fine-tuning sessions, which is a core aspect of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are traditional software development activities, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of different capabilities (human and AI) to deliver a service, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products, fitting the 'Learning & Adaptability' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving without constant managerial guidance, aligning with 'Problem Solving & Pragmatism'.

profile.rationale: The job primarily focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support resolutions and improving existing AI systems (Macro-Category A tasks like 'Software Development & Integration'). While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning and testing new AI tools, the core responsibility is the application and improvement of AI within a support context, rather than deep model development or specialization. The role is about using AI to enhance an existing function (customer support) and improving the AI as part of that process, making it 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a support function. The distinction between core AI development and applying AI to solve business problems is evident. However, the ad is concise, and some nuances of the 'fine-tuning' aspect could be interpreted differently, leading to a slightly less than perfect confidence score.
